summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing preparation of plans, specifications, cost estimates and a preliminary assessment roll for the proposed improvement of E. Newton St. from 12th Ave. E. to Everett Ave. E. and certain other streets and avenues by constructing underground utility lines and a residental street lighting system by local improvement district procedures as contemplated by Resolution No. 25431, making an appropriation from the Light Fund for necessary expenses of the Engineering Department in connection therewith, and providing for reimbursement of the Light Fund if a local improvement district is formed.
